experiences.title: Senior Manager, Software Engineering
experiences.description: Leading multiple on and off shore teams supporting high-volume APIs for payment services in the automotive industry. Providing organizational and architectural leadership while partnering with product and program management teams to ensure successful feature delivery and maintain high resilience and quality for our payment platform.

experiences.title: Chief Technology Officer
experiences.description: Led Platform, Feature, DevOps and Reliability Engineering for EPSoft's flagship SaaS platform. Participated in hands-on execution of key features, platform modules, and DevOps implementations. Built programs to cultivate intrinsic motivation, establish team performance metrics, and mature infrastructure-as-code capabilities.

experiences.title: Director - Core Systems Modernization
experiences.description: Led application development teams in modernizing core systems to Cloud-ready architectures. Served as Principal Architect for Event Driven Microservice solutions and led CI/CD implementations. Successfully guided the systems modernization architecture team through the merger of TSYS and Global Payments.

experiences.title: Director, Application System Development for Big Data
experiences.description: Principal architect and leader for Big Data platform implementation, achieving near-realtime data ingestion pipeline supporting multi-billion events per day. Led DevOps CI/CD implementation and cultivated an environment of high-feedback and continuous learning.

experiences.title: Associate Director - Application System Development
experiences.description: Led technical teams responsible for Emerging Technologies, Data Warehouse, and Automated Testing. Improved technical and behavioral skills of the team, increased code coverage, and led migration to progressive technologies.
